online.search
Class UCTNode

java.lang.Object
  online.search.UCTNode

public class UCTNode
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
ddyer based on the Monte "GameNode" class for tantrix.com by Pete Bruns These are used in conjunction with "commonMove" to save work-in-progress information during uct search. the children of UCT nodes are commonMove, which have an associated uct node only if they have been visited.
